strapiPost.title: Share Life Changing Stories Today Through The Miracles & Magic Radiothon
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Miracles and Magic Radiothon
strapiPost.content:
While no-one ever wants to see their child in the hospital, the team at Arkansas Children’s NW have gone above and beyond to bring the best pediatric care available to NWA. If you’ve benefited from the excellent care at ACNW or know someone who owes their life to their amazing team, today is a great way to give back through the Miracles & Magic Radiothon. Tune in to Magic 107.9 and KNWA stations to hear stories, and call in to donate and share your ACNW story with a phone bank volunteer.

  • Share your miracle: Volunteers from the community are standing by the phone and want to hear your story! Call in and share your ACNW story by dialing 479-455-KIDS (5437).
  • Share the magic: The magic that makes the work of ACNW possible is the continued generosity of our amazing community. Call today or donate online to keep the magic going. 

Make a lifesaving difference and donate HERE.
